title: Marked
description: Shapeshifter Xander will remain stuck in oblivion betweengood and evil until he is marked--either with the sphere that will identify himas a servant of the underworld or with the water mark, serving the keepers ofhumans, vampires, and warlocks.One decision will mark him and his twin sister Mira equally.She is in love with a man bearing the water mark and wants Xander to follow thepath of the good. But Xander loves a black witch, a minion of the underworld.All he has to do to join her forever is kill.After all, there's something good about being bad.
author: Marta Szemik
